```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

### Make some vectors 
```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", "4", "yellow")

# check the class
class(marmots)
```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4,6.8,2.9,8.8,8.5)
class(pika)


# scalar multiplier 
scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika
```


```{r}
bananas <- c(1,2,3)
apples <- c(6,7,8)

bananas + apples
bananas - apples
bananas %*% apples
```
